text: They sent a coupon for a free pizza in the mail. I hadn't been to Little Caesars in years. The Sausage pie was really good, and the service was fast..it was hot and fresh, and got me to come back a few days later and order a Ultimate ‚Ä¶More

name: Denise Moon
text: Cheap but fast pizza. Nothing special about their food... you get what you pay for. I do really like the double cheese, double pepperoni with extra sauce (which you have to order extra). Only downfall is that they don't deliver.

name: RJ Rivera
text: Cheap little pizza place, food is always ready and the special orders don't take them to long to get done and shocker I don't have to have them make the order over 2 or 3 times. Prices are reasonable and staff are pretty enjoyable to watch ‚Ä¶More

text: I order from here a lot. I always call in and order extra cheese and they always make it delicious, they are never stingy. It is always done on time and to my liking. I reccomend this Little Caesar's.
